  children={"Update note"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/v1/note/{docId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update a note by Id

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"docId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"String Id of the note"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"note":{"description":"Note text","type":"string"},"title":{"description":"Name of the note","type":"string"},"color":{"description":"Color of the object (\\#ffffff, \\#ffffffff or ffffff)","type":"string"},"member":{"description":"Id of the member this note belongs to","type":"boolean"},"date":{"description":"Milliseconds since epoch for this timestamp/date","type":"integer"},"supportDescMarkdown":{"description":"Whether the description supports markdown"}},"title":"notesPatch"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK"},"404":{"description":"NOT FOUND"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
